name: Present Tense Stem Change -ar verbs
description: -ar stem-changing verbs vowel. e changes to ie.

bulletpoints: shoe verb, in all forms except nosostros and vosotros.

sentenceList.english: I got it right the second time.
sentenceList.spanish: Acerté a la segunda vez.

sentenceList.english: I have to get it right this time
sentenceList.spanish: Tengo que acertar esta vez.

sentenceList.english: I always get the words right.
sentenceList.spanish: Siempre acierto las palabras.

sentenceList.english: I govern over the children in my house as a father.
sentenceList.spanish: Yo gobierno sobre los niños en mi casa como un padre.

sentenceList.english: I governed yesterday sole. Today we govern together.
sentenceList.spanish: Goberné ayer sole. Hoy gobernamos juntos.
Cierro la puerta todos los días.
sentenceList.english: I close the gate everday.

sentenceList.spanish: Lo cerré ayer también, pero el perro lo empujó para abrirlo
sentenceList.english: I closed it yesterday also, but the dog pushed it open.

sentenceList.spanish: Mañana cerraré la puerta y la bloquearé.
sentenceList.english: Tommorow I will close the gate and lock it.

sentenceList.spanish: Ella piensa en su amiga durante el día.
sentenceList.english: she thinks about her friend during the day.

sentenceList.spanish: yesterday,I thought about my dreams and goals
sentenceList.english: Ayer pensé en mis sueños y metas.

sentenceList.spanish: mañana pensaremos en tus facturas hoy festejaremos.
sentenceList.english: tommorow, we will think about our bills today we will party.

sentenceList.spanish: Empiezo a estudiar español cuando bebo café.
sentenceList.english: I begin to study spanish when I drink cafe.

sentenceList.spanish: ayer empezaron a estudiar español por la noche.
sentenceList.english: yesterday, they began to study spanish at night.

name: Misc Irregular Verb

sentenceList.english: I do my homework not because I want to but because I have to.

sentenceList.english: I made my coffee strong this morning. Now I am going to work on my project.
